DOC.brief_summary: Clinical research , like science , self-correcting , error detect scientific community communicate publishing journal , relay information ( resolution ) reader . If relay process fails , science grind halt . In study test integrity .
DOC.brief_title: Coordinated Assessment Notifications Trials Containing Overt Published Errors
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study document outcome notification journal editorial board ( equivalent authority ) factually incorrect inconsistent claim , report publish .
